Strange, I know, but we do not choose our names, do we?}} '''Ponamu Bird-Scorned''' is a character in {{poe1}} (with the [Deadfire Pack](/pillarsOfEternityDeadfirePack/)) and {{poe2}} (with the [Scalawags Pack](/scalawagsPack/)). ## Background An Aumaua who has been shipwrecked on his way to Defiance Bay, his hair matted and once-bright clothes in ruins. Equally ruined is his face, a hatching of thin scars crossed by broader wounds. He was part of a crew from the [Deadfire Archipelago](/deadfireArchipelago/), trafficking goods to Defiance Bay, when a storm cast his ship on the stones of the Compass. He can be found in [Anslög's Compass](/anslogsCompass/), slightly northwest of [Ranga](/ranga/), on the path to get to her camp. ## ={{poe2}} = After the Watcher's defeat of Thaos, Ponamu returned to the Deadfire, picking up his trade of a boatswain. ## Interactions ## =''Deadfire Pack'' = {{interactions |wares =
